submissions.title: Village fete
submissions.location: Taffeta Farmhouse (where the pig pen used to be)
submissions.description: We're hiring a pizza van, some carnival games and setting up some hay bales round our beautiful fire pits. Family friendly. Mulled wine for adults, soft drinks for the kiddies!

submissions.title: Mama Rose's Cafe
submissions.description: You won't believe the things these people do to muffins.

submissions.title: Bruce's Hardware
submissions.description: This man knows his way around a hammer, sickle, and sword. A sight not to be missed

submissions.title: Tory's Laundromat
submissions.description: These folks know how to get the stains out of everything; your shirts, your carpet, your reputation.

submissions.title: Community Bake Off
submissions.location: Taffeta Farmhouse (where the pig pen used to be)
submissions.description: We're hiring a pizza van, some carnival games and setting up some hay bales round our beautiful fire pits. Family friendly. Mulled wine for adults, soft drinks for the kiddies!

submissions.title: Chili cookoff
submissions.description: My wife doesn't agree that my chili is the best in town. Bring your best efforts and let's prove her right!

submissions.title: Mama Rose's Cafe
submissions.description: You won't believe the things these people do to muffins.

submissions.title: Village Pantomime
submissions.description: We're doing an extra month of the panto. BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND!

submissions.title: Baseball card swap meet
submissions.description: I'm looking for my DiMaggio. Will swap one of my spare Babe Ruths

submissions.title: Tony's Art Gallery
submissions.description: I would definitely recommend going, obviously, because like, it's amazing that Tony's got a hold of 2 genuine Van Gogh's and that, but it does raise a few questions, dunnit?.
